summary: Frontend-only testing of Unatienda UI Reorganization. All features working correctly: Module loads at /admin#unatienda with 4 compact inline stat badges (replacing 4 large cards). Tab navigation reorganized from 10 flat tabs into 4 logical groups (CATALOG: Inventory/Public Store/Stock Mov, ORDERS: Textbook Orders/Access Requests, SCHOOL: Students/School Year, SETTINGS: Order Form/Config/Demo Data) with 3 visual dividers between groups. Inventory tab shows compact toolbar and inline stats instead of 6 stat cards. All filters (catalog type, search, grade, subject, status) work. Products table has sortable columns. Add Product button opens form dialog.
passed_tests: Unatienda module loads at /admin#unatienda with compact stats bar
Compact stats bar shows 4 inline stat badges (Public, Textbooks, Students, Pending)
Tab navigation has 4 groups (CATALOG, ORDERS, SCHOOL, SETTINGS) with visual dividers
10 tabs total across 4 groups - all rendering correctly
Inventory tab (default) loads with compact toolbar and unified product management
Public Store tab loads the public catalog content with product list
Stock Mov. tab loads stock movements content
Textbook Orders tab loads orders content
Students tab loads with student profiles table (27 total, 4 locked, 9 active grades)
Catalog type filter (All/School Textbooks/Public Store/Archived) works
Inventory inline stats showing (32 total, 32 active, 873 stock, 3 low stock, 3 out of stock, 5 grades)
Products table renders with sortable columns (Name, Code, Grade, Category, Publisher, Price, Stock, Pre-sale, Status)
Add Product button opens form dialog with all required fields
critical_code_review_comments: Console warning: React 'Each child in a list should have a unique key prop' in TableBody/CatalogoPublicoTab - minor issue but should add unique keys
Console warning: Nested button in button HTML error from LivingGridLanding - not related to Unatienda but visible in console
context_for_next_testing_agent: Unatienda UI Reorganization complete. Key changes: 10 flat tabs now organized into 4 groups (CATALOG, ORDERS, SCHOOL, SETTINGS). Module-level 4 stat cards compacted to inline badges with data-testid='unatienda-stats'. Inventory tab's 6 stat cards compacted to inline badges with data-testid='inventory-stats'. Tab navigation uses data-testid='tab-{id}' selectors. Catalog type filter uses data-testid='catalog-{type}' selectors. All 10 tabs clickable and loading correct content.
